extendedInfo.description: Scientific calculator with advanced features.Simple or advanced mode, just by turning your phone.Get the paid version for more features including unit convertions, loan calculator.Ver 1.0.8:Fixed back button not exiting.Fixed larger screens.Added Deg,Rad,Grad options.Ver 1.0.4:Fixed % key to be more natural (i.e. "10-10%=9")Fixed rounding errors.

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: Lol I downloaded the free version and I tried to use the extra stuff... it said this is only in the paid version. So why download this one when my phone came with one. Waste of time. Creaters created this one so they could get us to buy the paid one!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Must have
reviews.comment: App that I was missed until found. Thnx
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: nice
reviews.comment: It\'s just what I need. Simple and memory store. Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great!
reviews.comment: I use it every day!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this calculator. Don\'t even use my brain anymore. Bad, I know. Force closes on open sometimes but not a big deal.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good calc, but a dark theme would be nice!
reviews.comment: Good calc, but a dark theme to match gingerbread style would be very nice
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Delete lot time
reviews.comment: Great app only prob I have is when you adding or what ever you forget you pushed add button it adds more lol also some times the calc is to touchy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not much different than any calculator. Its just a dumb old calculator
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I really tired while tried to find a calculator with logarithms with user-defined base...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sometimes make calculation errors. Lg gw620
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Probably the best free calculator on the store. If you want a iphone type this is the one for you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I am looking for a ten key calculator with a scrolling tape. This one is close but still adds negative numbers to the total.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: V good, almost like iphone calc which is the best. Can u add AC button?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I really do like it, its just a shame on the HTC sensation it doesn\'t fit the screen at all :/ Also I agree it needs a dark theme to! :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very nice calculator but the operator keys (+-etc) should have a better contrast. They appear as white on very light grey. Very hard to see. DroidX
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would love to make the sign buttons glow or framed when pressed indicating last button I chose.. other than that, it\'s better than stock
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is what I looking for. Natural percentage. Great app with simple and beautiful layout.

reviews.comment: All trig calculations r wrong...

reviews.comment: Has some rounding errors.

reviews.comment: So much better than stock. How can the stock calculator not have a percentage feature??????????
